featured.text: Bekoji’s legend Derartu Tulu, who won the 10,000-meter Olympic gold medals in 1992 and 2000, is a national hero.
All these kids share the same dream: Some day they could become another Derartu Tulu. 53.

definition.zh_def: 德拉圖，埃塞俄比亞著名的長跑運動員，以其在奧運會和世界田徑錦標賽中的成就而聞名。
definition.en_def: Derartu is a renowned Ethiopian long-distance runner known for her achievements in the Olympics and World Athletics Championships.
definition.example: Derartu won the gold medal in the 10,000 meters at the 1996 Olympics.
